title: Learning Effect Optimization Design Based on Numerical Information Representation Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Numeracy Skills for Data Interpretation, Experience with VR Device Usage
context.additional_context: VR simulation participation in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments per learner, with application of social studies data analysis scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain cognitive processing differences between tabular and graphical representations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can select optimal numerical representation methods using EEG-based cognitive load metrics.
Learners can analyze social studies data in VR simulation environments and reach conclusions with 90% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
